subject: Use rpm macro For x86_64 compatibility.
commitMessage:
Use rpm macro For x86_64 compatibility.

Fix :Do not provide pkgconfig(libatasmart) for arch x86_64.
Signed-off-by: Ronan Le Martret <ronan@fridu.net>

Change-Id: Ia18f881664ebb2182a0162faea2153d92db41517

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

I'd be grateful if you'd change commit message. Your changes aren't x86_64 exclusive.

Please read the following pages and follow the guidliens for writing commit message contained therein.
http://bit.ly/goodcommitmessages
http://who-t.blogspot.com/2009/12/on-commit-messages.html
http://dep.debian.net/deps/dep3/
https://wiki.tizen.org/wiki/Talk:Packaging/Guidelines

Otherwise looks good.
Patch Set 2: Commit message was updated
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1
Patch Set 2: Verified+1 Code-Review+2
